dlentry.dd: Opens the Edit Properties dialog box that allows you to configure the properties of a selected node. You can find more details about this dialog box in the topic.

dlentry.dt: Select an element from the content source Section

dlentry.dd: You can use this drop-down list to select specific types of elements to be displayed in the subsequent table. This can help you narrow down the list of possible source elements that you can select.
You can also use the text filter field to narrow down the list of possible source elements to be displayed in the subsequent table.

Present all the element IDs defined in the source topic. Use this table to select the Element ID of the element that you want to insert its content. You can select multiple contiguous elements to insert a block of content.
Displays the content that will be inserted. If you select multiple elements in the element table, the content from all the selected elements is displayed.
Displays the source code of the element to be referenced.

body.p: When Key is selected for the content source, you can use keys to reference content. You can use the Choose Key Reference button to open a dialog box that allows you to select one from a list of all the keys that are gathered from the root map.If the DITA Map is not opened in the DITA Maps Manager view, no keys will be listed.
